com.github.sviengine.animation

Class SVIAnimation

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.sviengine.animation.SVIAnimation
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    SVIAnimationSet, SVIParticleAnimation, SVIPropertyAnimation, SVISpriteAnimation, SVITransitionAnimation

    public class SVIAnimation
extends Object
    SVIAnimation Class include control animation property and type.
